data: There is no sight more uninspiring than a ferry-boat crowded with human beings at a quarter of six o’clock in the evening, when the great homeward rush from the offices and commercial houses sets in.
quarter of six o’clock in the evening
Cutting, Mary Stewart, 1851-1924; Stephens, Alice Barber, 1858-1932 [Illustrator]
